languages.text: {n}Инцендия Чорда наблюдает за собеседником с едва сдерживаемым презрением.{/n} "Да, ты нашел достойную компанию, Каллигос. Теперь ты хотя бы сможешь предаваться тщетным развлечениям, хвастаться властью и отдаваться греховным забавам в компании равно{mf|го|й}, а не членов низшего сословия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инцендия Чорда наблюдает за собеседником с едва сдерживаемым презрением.{/n} "Да, ты нашел достойную компанию, Каллигос. Теперь ты хотя бы сможешь предаваться тщетным развлечениям, хвастаться властью и отдаваться греховным забавам в компании равно{mf|го|й}, а не членов низшего сословия".

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия Чорда наблюдает за собеседником с едва сдерживаемым презрением.{/n} "Да, ты нашел достойную компанию, Каллигос. Теперь ты хотя бы сможешь предаваться тщетным развлечениям, хвастаться властью и отдаваться греховным забавам в компании равно{mf|го|й}, а не членов низшего сословия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in sinful pastimes with one who is your equal and not a member of a lower class."

{n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in sinful pastimes with one who is your equal and not a member of a lower class."

{n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in sinful pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in sinful pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

{n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

languages.text: {n}インセンディア・コーダは軽蔑の念をどうにか押し殺してカリゴスを見つめている。{/n}「ああ、お前が友人にふさわしいことは分かっているよ、カリゴス。少なくとも今は、下級メンバーではなく同等の仲間と共に意味のない気晴らしを楽しんで、英気を養い、下品な道楽にふけるといい」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディア・コーダは軽蔑の念をどうにか押し殺してカリゴスを見つめている。{/n}「ああ、お前が友人にふさわしいことは分かっているよ、カリゴス。少なくとも今は、下級メンバーではなく同等の仲間と共に意味のない気晴らしを楽しんで、英気を養い、下品な道楽にふけるといい」

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅·库尔达瞥了卡里戈斯一眼，目光难掩鄙夷之情。{/n}“是啊，你终于找到同伴了，卡里戈斯。现在你可以和你那位平起平坐的朋友一起享受空虚的玩乐，高谈无用的废话，纵情亵渎的消遣，不用整天再和一群下九流厮混在一起了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅·库尔达瞥了卡里戈斯一眼，目光难掩鄙夷之情。{/n}“是啊，你终于找到同伴了，卡里戈斯。现在你可以和你那位平起平坐的朋友一起享受空虚的玩乐，高谈无用的废话，纵情亵渎的消遣，不用整天再和一群下九流厮混在一起了。”

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda le observa con un desprecio que apenas logra contener.{/n} «Sí, por fin ha encontrado compañía adecuada, Calligos. Por lo menos, ahora podrá disfrutar de divertimentos banales, jactarse de su poder y participar en pasatiempos profanos con alguien de su misma clase en vez de un inferior».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda le observa con un desprecio que apenas logra contener.{/n} «Sí, por fin ha encontrado compañía adecuada, Calligos. Por lo menos, ahora podrá disfrutar de divertimentos banales, jactarse de su poder y participar en pasatiempos profanos con alguien de su misma clase en vez de un inferior».

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda ne semble pas vouloir faire le moindre effort pour dissimuler son mépris.{/n} « C'est vrai que vous avez désormais {mf|un|une} partenaire digne de vous, Calligos. Vous allez enfin pouvoir vous complaire dans la frivolité, vous vanter de votre puissance et vous adonner à des loisirs grossiers avec quelqu'un qui est véritablement votre égal, et pas un membre des classes inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda ne semble pas vouloir faire le moindre effort pour dissimuler son mépris.{/n} « C'est vrai que vous avez désormais {mf|un|une} partenaire digne de vous, Calligos. Vous allez enfin pouvoir vous complaire dans la frivolité, vous vanter de votre puissance et vous adonner à des loisirs grossiers avec quelqu'un qui est véritablement votre égal, et pas un membre des classes inférieurs. »

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda betrachtet ihn mit kaum verhohlener Abneigung.{/n} "Ja, da habt Ihr wohl geeignete Gesellschaft gefunden, Calligos. Jetzt könnt Ihr wenigstens mit einer Person dem Nichtstun frönen, von Eurer Macht prahlen und albernen Hobbys nachgehen, die Euch gleichgestellt ist und kein Mitglied der unteren Klassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda betrachtet ihn mit kaum verhohlener Abneigung.{/n} "Ja, da habt Ihr wohl geeignete Gesellschaft gefunden, Calligos. Jetzt könnt Ihr wenigstens mit einer Person dem Nichtstun frönen, von Eurer Macht prahlen und albernen Hobbys nachgehen, die Euch gleichgestellt ist und kein Mitglied der unteren Klassen."

languages.text: {n}İncendia Chorda, zor bastırdığı bir küçümsemeyle Winterscale'i izliyor.{/n} "Evet, sonunda münasip bir arkadaş buldun Calligos. Alt tabakadan usanmışsındır. En azından artık boş meşgalelerin tadını birlikte çıkaracağın, gücünü öveceğin ve adi eğlencelerde sana eşlik edecek bir dengin var."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is watching him with barely suppressed contempt.{/n} "Yes, you have found yourself suitable company, Calligos. At the very least, now you can enjoy idle diversions, boast about your power, and indulge in profane pastimes with one who is your equal, rather than a member of the lower classes."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia Chorda, kendisini zor bastırdığı bir küçümsemeyle izliyor.{/n} "Evet, sonunda münasip bir arkadaş buldun Calligos. En azından artık boş meşgalelerin tadını birlikte çıkaracağın, gücünü öveceğin ve adi eğlencelere birlikte katılabileceğin bir dengin var. Alt tabakadan usanmışsındır."
